title: /add
description: the command adds a note to the list

title: /new-list
description: the command creates a new list

title: /print-all
description: the command shows all the lists with the number of notes inside them

title: /print
description: the command shows one list with all notes and their states (completed or not)

title:
/cls
/clear
description: two commands clear the terminal, use the one that is convenient for you

title: /help
description: the command to display a list of commands and their explanations

title: /exit
description: the command to exit the program
